snippet.title: Best MP3 players
snippet.description: Standalone MP3 players and iPods have largely been supplanted by smartphones -- but there are still

snippet.title: Hercules Mobile DJ MP3
snippet.description: The Hercules Mobile DJ MP3 gives you an affordable, fun, and effortless way to wirelessly DJ music playing from your computer.

snippet.title: PonoPlayer
snippet.description: After years of speculation, Neil Young's Pono device has finally appeared on Kickstarter, but what makes it different from a smartphone? CNET takes a closer look at this device and tells you what you need to know.

snippet.title: How to convert FLAC audio files to MP3 with Foobar2000
snippet.description: Converting your FLAC audio files to MP3 is quicker and easier than reripping all of your CDs.

snippet.title: Convert images using Preview in OS X
snippet.description: Apple's Preview program can be used to quickly convert any supported image or PDF into one of several formats.

snippet.title: Convert audio to ringtones using OS X Terminal
snippet.description: If you want to use an audio file as a ringtone in iOS, you can use Terminal and iTunes to convert and import tones to your device.

snippet.title: Sony Walkman NWZ-ZX1
snippet.description: With its aluminium body, high-quality digital audio amplifier, and ability to play lossless audio files, the Sony NWZ-Z10 is an MP3 player for the dedicated audiophile that demands top-quality sound.

snippet.title: What is FLAC? The high-def MP3 explained
snippet.description: CNET explains what FLAC is, as well as where to buy music in the FLAC format, and how to play it on your iPhone, computer, or MP3 player.

snippet.title: Huawei Ascend W2
snippet.description: The colorful W2 range follows up last year's Ascend W1, first seen at CES, with this 4.3-inch, dual core Windows phone.

snippet.title: Convert your cassettes to iPhone MP3s
